âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Instant terminal sharing using Zellij â€¢ Server-less architecture â€¢ NAT gateway traversal â€¢ Ephemeral SSH remote port-forwarding tunnel â€¢ Built-in minimal SSH server
ðŸ“– Summary: Ziina enables instant terminal sharing by creating an ephemeral SSH tunnel to a local Zellij session. It's server-less, requiring only a standard OpenSSH server with a public IP. Peers can connect to the Zellij session through the tunnel using a standard SSH client, making collaboration easy even behind NAT gateways.
